backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles, feed items, likes, comments, and media uploads with access control and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Defines migration from old actor state to new format by adding a comments map while preserving existing data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like list summarizing all frontend files and their roles in the app.
frontend/deploy/dfx-frontend-canister-as: Template showing correct dfx.json configuration for deploying frontend assets from dist/ with backend dependency.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining how to build and deploy the frontend canister using Vite’s dist output.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color systems and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up PWA metadata, icons, cache headers, and loading src/main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining metadata, icons, theme colors, and display settings for the app.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing versioned static caching, runtime caching for same-origin GET requests, cache cleanup, and offline fallback while excluding all API/canister traffic.
frontend/scripts/deploy-frontend-prod.sh: Shell script that builds the frontend, verifies build output and canister config, and deploys the assets canister to production using dfx.
frontend/scripts/verify-dist-shell.ts: Node script validating the dist/ build output, checking index.html for correct asset references and ensuring required static files exist.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend-caniste: Node script that verifies dfx.json correctly configures the frontend canister as an assets canister pointing to dist/ and optionally depending on the backend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling auth state, service worker registration with update flow, profile setup, and global PIN challenge logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication and clearing cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Simple profile setup form allowing new authenticated users to submit and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/capture/VideoCap: Implements camera initialization and WebM recording with playback, retake, and completion handling.
frontend/src/components/comments/Comment: Provides a text and media comment composer with file validation, upload progress, and comment submission.
Renders a list of comments with author info, text, and optional image/video attachments.
Displays comments in a bottom sheet with loading states, list rendering, and a composer for adding new comments.
frontend/src/components/editor/MediaEdit: Offers image/video editing tools including filters, text overlay, cropping, and trimming before returning an edited file.
frontend/src/components/feed/FeedItem.ts: Represents a feed item with video playback controls, like interactions, comments panel, and sharing options.
frontend/src/components/feed/FeedOverlay: Shows handle and caption overlay on feed items with optional active video controls.
frontend/src/components/feed/Interaction: Renders like, comment, share, and download controls for a feed item with authentication and loading checks.
frontend/src/components/feed/SpeedContro: Provides a dropdown to adjust playback speed using preset values.
frontend/src/components/feed/UploadButto: Button that opens the upload dialog after confirming the user is logged in.
frontend/src/components/feed/UploadDialo: Handles file selection, validation, capture, editing, and uploading with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/components/feed/VideoFeed.t: Displays an infinite-scroll style vertical feed with intersection tracking, deep link scrolling, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/feed/VideoFeedIt: Placeholder file exporting nothing to avoid build errors.
frontend/src/components/feed/VideoOverla: Shows play/pause and mute/unmute overlay controls on a video.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchBut: Opens the search dialog when clicked.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDia: Search UI with debounced input, authenticated search requests, and result listing.
frontend/src/components/security/PinChal: Prompts user for a PIN, validates attempts, and triggers success or lockout handling.
frontend/src/components/security/Securit: Opens the security setup dialog via a shield icon button.
A dialog guiding users through creating a PIN and security questions, validating input and saving via useSecuritySetup.
A share dialog allowing link copying or native sharing with feedback states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceTrust.ts: Tracks a persistent device ID in localStorage and marks whether the device is recognized.
frontend/src/hooks/useDoubleTap.ts: Provides a ref that detects double‑tap or double‑click gestures and triggers a callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading identities, handling login/logout, and managing status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for feed items, media upload, and like toggling with optimistic updates and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecuritySetup.ts: Manages local security setup with PIN and questions, providing save and verification helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles, theme variables, mobile viewport fixes, and scrollbar/overscroll behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/utils/downloadMedia.ts: Utility to fetch a media URL and trigger a client-side file download.
frontend/src/utils/mediaEdits.ts: Provides client-side image editing via canvas with filters and text overlays, and returns original video files since video editing isn’t implemented.
frontend/src/utils/shareLinks.ts: Generates post share URLs, copies text to clipboard, and wraps the browser’s native share API when available.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Gets and removes URL query parameters, supporting both standard and hash-based queries, with a helper for secret params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, env var injection, path aliases, build output settings, API proxying, and global shim for dependencies.
project_state.json: Tracks project requirements, architecture notes, existing features, and known issues for the TikTok-style app expansion.
